entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Workloads are broken on Fedora 40 #44082
  • Stable CS2012 (`The process cannot access the file`) on first build with 8.0.10 release #44080
  • After updating NET 8.0.8 and .NET SDK 8.0.400 SDK, Application fails with exception Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Client.Core, Version=8.0.8.0'. #44055
  • dotnet publish inside WSL cannot handle read only files which are copied to the output path #44053
  • [NETSDKE2E]After installing NET 9 RTM SDK and downloading wasm-tools, uninstalling the SDK does not completely clear the contents under the dotnet directory. #44052
  • 'dotnet tool install' command fails for platform linux/arm64 - Unhandled exception: System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #44051
  • [NETSDKE2E]Warning "NU1903: Package 'System.Text.Json' 6.0.0 has a known high severity vulnerability, https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-8g4q-xg66-9fp4" displays after creating MStest project in CLI. #44048
  • dotnet-watch: HotReloadProfile not detected correctly on unrestored app #44044
  • SDK writes package version to deps file in place of assembly version for project references #44042

Closed

  • Swixbuild task is now failing against .NET 8 RC 2 #36081
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64][intermittent]Get "Fatal error. System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt." When running the command quickly. #41588
    10.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Update bootstrap arcade #44086
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44085
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove a extra item line #44084
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44083
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #44081
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add local package patterns to source-mappings for online feeds #44076
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44075
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix port error when fallback to http #44050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Allow for older Windows SDK projection packages without profiles to build on .NET 9 #43795
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-WindowsSDK
  • [main] Add nowarn for NU1903 #44078
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add Dev Device ID #43357
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Add Dev Device ID #43360
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Add Dev Device ID #43362
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge from rc2 to ensure we have internal flow changes #43987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44057
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #44047
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] WebSdk: new 'OneDeploy' publish method #44038
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44045
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #44046
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #44022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #43982
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44037
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Linux: Installing/Updating packages with uppercase versions #43988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update Windows SDK projection versions #43889
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Remove old source-build controls #43479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch back to 17.8.3 for the minimum msbuild version #43995
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 8.0.11
  • [release/9.0.1xx] AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43942
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2557151 #43920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Backport] Backports perf fixes to static web assets to RTM #43971
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update to the November release downlevel versions #43523
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SystemTextJsonToolsetPackageVersion #44029
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand osx-arm64 test coverage #44008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WASM and agent refactoring #43975
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
